reviewtext: VERY HAPPY, it looks great, I'm so happy we got it. Holds good, it is a lil hard to get it to the wall. Other then that its fine I love how we have more room in our room. My husband is so happy I ordered this, it only cost us $28 free shipping and FAST(: VERY THANKFUL TO THE SELLER.
summary: SAMSUNG 32in PLASMA(: DOES THE WORK FOR US ( FAST SHIPPING!!!!!!!!)
